actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for the portion of certain Cuban expropriation losses which did not result in a reduction of taxes in prior taxable years.

summary.text: Allows a tax deduction, under the Internal Revenue Code, for the portion of qualified Cuban expropriation losses which did not result in a reduction of taxes in prior taxable years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for the portion of certain Cuban expropriation losses which did not result in a reduction of taxes in prior taxable years.
